channel.title: Posts on My First Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My First Website

item.title: My First Shiny App Details
item.description: I have deployed my first shiny app when I was working on the Problem Set # 3 This was a challenging yet rewarding assignment where we were given clear instructions and chunks of code In order to complete this assignment, one has to understand the concept of reactivity and how to render reactive data elements. Below is the final code that I have deployed and feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
